mapper.select: SELECT user_code AS userCode, user_id AS userId, passwd, col_id AS colId, dept_id AS deptId, student_code AS studentCode, users.name, email, phone FROM users WHERE user_id = #{userId}

SELECT U.user_code AS userCode, user_id AS userId, passwd, col_id AS colId, dept_id AS deptId, student_code AS studentCode, U.name, email, phone, auth FROM users AS U INNER JOIN auth AS A ON U.user_code = A.user_code WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND passwd = #{passwd}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO users(user_id, passwd, col_id, dept_id, student_code, name, email, phone) VALUES (#{userId}, #{passwd}, ${colId}, ${deptId}, #{studentCode}, #{name}, #{email}, #{phone})
mapper.select: SELECT U.user_code AS userCode, user_id AS userId, college, dept, student_code AS studentCode, U.name, email, phone, auth FROM users AS U INNER JOIN auth AS A ON U.user_code = A.user_code INNER JOIN college AS C ON U.col_id = C.id INNER JOIN dept AS D ON U.dept_id = D.id

SELECT U.user_code AS userCode, user_id AS userId, college, dept, student_code AS studentCode, U.name
, cls.id AS classId, cls.year, cls.semester, cls.class_no AS classNo
FROM users AS U INNER JOIN auth AS A ON U.user_code = A.user_code INNER JOIN college AS C ON U.col_id = C.id INNER JOIN dept AS D ON U.dept_id = D.id
INNER JOIN class_std AS CS ON U.user_code = CS.user_code INNER JOIN pl_center.class AS cls ON CS.class_id = cls.id
WHERE auth = 0 AND ( U.user_id LIKE #{searchKey} OR college LIKE #{searchKey} OR dept LIKE #{searchKey} OR U.student_code LIKE #{searchKey} OR U.name LIKE #{searchKey} )
